attributes.action: Rescind Art 2 of the ECHR to protect NI Veterans from vexatious prosecutions.
attributes.additional_details:
It is wrong to investigate Veterans in respect of historic incidents that were the subject of contemporaneous investigations, with due consideration to the prevailing security situation and terrorist activity.
The passage of time erodes memories, many of the Veterans being investigated are both ageing and ailing men, who served their Country.
The worry and stress that those under investigations and their families have been subjected to is immoral and cruel, and must be halted forthwith.
attributes.background: Art 2 of the ECHR is continually exploited in N Ireland to instigate Inquiries and Inquests for historic incidents relying on “evidence” the veracity of which cannot be reliably substantiated.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action: 

Prevent the prosecution of veterans for historical offences.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/708556
